column5: Our place is close to the beach, shopping, restaurants, and the city center. This 3 bedroom, 3 bath condo has it all! There are 2 master suites w/ King beds, a third bedroom w/2 twin beds, & a set of bunk beds tucked into a hallway nook. Sleeps 8 comfortably. Kitchen is stocked w/dishes, appliances. Washer & dryer right in the unit! Two tropical pools, plus a playscape for the kids! BBQ & fire pit for use in pool area as well. Large/private covered patio. 2 car parking right outside the unit.
